issue.title: Laser scan (ray sensor) updates erratic and slower than desired

content.raw:
Are there news on this issue? This IMHO definitely is no minor issue and apparently affects simulation quality for every user simulating LIDARs. I causes a slower than intended update rate that is hard to notice if not explicitly looked for and that will break or silently degrade performance of systems relying on the requested update rate.
This issue is also the single reason why we are still stuck with electric, as sensor simulation in fuerte can be considered broken unless this is fixed.
